stories.definitionOfDone: • Feature Implementation: collect weather data, perform initial data processing, and transmit it to the data management system
stories.description: The system must collect weather data, perform initial data processing, and transmit it to the data management system so that weather forecasts are more accurate.
stories.testCases:
Test: collect weather data, perform initial data processing, and transmit it to the data management system
Expected: System performs collect weather data, perform initial data processing, and transmit it to the data management system successfully with valid output data
stories.title: Collect Weather Data Perform Initial

stories.definitionOfDone: • Source Basis: The key components of this system are: Station Maintenance System: Communicates with weather stations via satellite to monitor their health, provide reports of problems, and update embedded software. • Deliverables: {'unique_deliverable_name': {'definition_of_done': 'Remotely monitors station health through a minimum of uptime for at least , with all stations reporting their status via satellite of being queried.'}}
stories.description: The system must communicate with weather stations via satellite to monitor their health, provide reports of problems, and update embedded software so that station maintenance is improved.
stories.testCases:
Test: communicate with weather stations via satellite to monitor their health, provide reports of problems, and update embedded software
Expected: System performs communicate with weather stations via satellite to monitor their health, provide reports of problems, and update embedded software successfully with valid output data
stories.title: Communicate Weather Stations Via Satellite

stories.definitionOfDone: • Source Basis: The station software has additional responsibilities: Monitoring Instruments, Power, and Communication Hardware: Reports faults to the management system. • Deliverables: {'Fault_Tolerance_Report': {'definition_of_done': 'The system reliably reports hardware failures of occurrence, including detailed error messages and diagnostic information.'}}
stories.description: The system must report faults to the management system so that issues are identified and addressed promptly.
stories.testCases:
Test: report faults to the management system
Expected: System performs report faults to the management system successfully with valid output data
stories.title: Report Faults Management System

stories.definitionOfDone: • Source Basis: The station software has additional responsibilities: Managing System Power: Ensures batteries are charged when possible, while shutting down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions (e.g., high wind). • Deliverables: {'Power Management System': {'definition_of_done': 'The power management system is implemented with the following features: automatic battery charging, generator shutdown in adverse weather conditions, and real-time power monitoring. The system is thoroughly tested for at least 2 weeks to ensure seamless operation.'}}
stories.description: The system must ensure batteries are charged when possible, while shutting down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions so that power is maintained.
stories.testCases:
Test: ensure batteries are charged when possible, while shutting down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions
Expected: System performs ensure batteries are charged when possible, while shutting down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions successfully with valid output data
stories.title: Ensure Batteries Are Charged When

stories.definitionOfDone: • Source Basis: The station software has additional responsibilities: Dynamic Reconfiguration: Allows for software updates and backup instrument switching in case of system failure. • Deliverables: {'Dynamic Reconfiguration Mechanism': {'definition_of_done': 'The dynamic reconfiguration mechanism successfully switches to a backup instrument of system failure, with no data loss or corruption.', 'criteria': {'switch_time': '< ', 'data_loss': '0', 'corruption': '0'}}}
stories.description: The system must allow for software updates and backup instrument switching in case of system failure so that station reliability is maintained.
stories.testCases:
Test: allow for software updates and backup instrument switching in case of system failure
Expected: System performs allow for software updates and backup instrument switching in case of system failure successfully with valid output data
stories.title: Allow Software Updates Backup Instrument
